hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: project
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: name of the main project that should be updated with packages from its staging project

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: subproject
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the subproject that acts as staging project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: packagefilter
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: space separated strings to filter the packages by their names (from the beginning)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: starttime
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: UNIX timestamp of when succeeding test was started to avoid copying broken versions

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# DEBUG MODE with E=echo # NORMAL MODE with E= E=
if [ -z "$starttime" ] ; then echo "FATAL: calling script needs to specify starttime" exit 1 fi
case $subproject in None) echo "No valid 'subproject' provided - defaults for safety reasons to 'None'" exit 1 ;; "-") echo "Subproject set to '-': skip job, do not fail (eg. for Master project)" exit 0 ;; esac
export BS=IBS case $BS in OBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.opensuse.org" ;; IBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.suse.de" ;; esac
COS=$project ECOS="" COSS=$COS:$subproject export BS_CHECKOUT=/home/jenkins/${BS}_CHECKOUT/$COSS submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_12_SP1
case $project in Devel:Cloud:4) OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; Devel:Cloud:5) OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; Devel:Cloud:6) ECOS=systemsmanagement:crowbar:3.0 ;; Devel:Cloud:7) OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_12_SP2 ECOS=systemsmanagement:crowbar:4.0 ;; *) echo "Please add support for the project: $project" exit 1 esac
for COMPONENT in `$OSC ls $COSS 2>/dev/null | grep -E "^(${packagefilter// /|})" | grep -v "^_product."` ; do cd $BS_CHECKOUT || exit 1 if [ ! -d $COMPONENT ] ; then $OSC co -o $COMPONENT $COSS $COMPONENT fi cd $COMPONENT || exit 1
grep -q "<linkinfo" .osc/_files || exit 2
# avoid copying untested versions lastchange=$($OSC api "source/$COSS/$COMPONENT/_history" | perl -ne 'if(m/<time>(\d+)</) {print $1; exit 0}') if [[ $lastchange > $starttime ]] ; then echo "skipping $COMPONENT because of a change after test started" continue fi
# if $OSC rdiff $COS $COMPONENT $COSS | grep . && $OSC api /build/$COSS/$OSCBUILDDIST/x86_64/$COMPONENT/_status | grep -E 'code="succeeded"|package="_product"' if $OSC rdiff $COS $COMPONENT $COSS | grep . && ( [ "$COMPONENT" = "_product" ] || $OSC r $COSS $COMPONENT -r $OSCBUILDDIST -a x86_64 | grep 'succeeded' ) then # NOTE(saschpe): the "|| :" is a work-around for an osc bug (should be fixed, but Adrian needs to release a new osc) # No need to put this in git. [[ "$COMPONENT" =~ -doc$ ]] || { $E $submitcmd $COSS $COMPONENT $COS || :
if [[ "$COMPONENT" =~ "crow" ]]; then [ -n "$ECOS" ] && $E $submitcmd $COSS $COMPONENT -t https://api.opensuse.org/ $ECOS || : fi } fi done
